record.field: <TKhai> <DLTKhai Id="DLTKhai"> <TTChung> <PBan>2.0.1</PBan> <MSo>{MSo}</MSo> <Ten>Đăng ký/Thay đổi thông tin sử dụng hóa đơn điện tử</Ten> <HThuc>{HThuc}</HThuc> <TNNT>{TNNT}</TNNT> <MST>{MST}</MST> <CQTQLy>{CQTQLy}</CQTQLy> <MCQTQLy>{MCQTQLy}</MCQTQLy> <NLHe>{NLHe}</NLHe> <DCLHe>{DCLHe}</DCLHe> <DCTDTu>{DCTDTu}</DCTDTu> <DTLHe>{DTLHe}</DTLHe> <DDanh>{DDanh}</DDanh> <NLap>{NLap}</NLap> </TTChung> <NDTKhai> <HTHDon> <CMa>{CMa}</CMa> <KCMa>{KCMa}</KCMa> {CMTMTTien} </HTHDon> <HTGDLHDDT> <NNTDBKKhan>{NNTDBKKhan}</NNTDBKKhan> <NNTKTDNUBND>{NNTKTDNUBND}</NNTKTDNUBND> <CDLTTDCQT>{CDLTTDCQT}</CDLTTDCQT> <CDLQTCTN>{CDLQTCTN}</CDLQTCTN> </HTGDLHDDT> <PThuc> <CDDu>{CDDu}</CDDu> <CBTHop>{CBTHop}</CBTHop> </PThuc> <LHDSDung> <HDGTGT>{HDGTGT}</HDGTGT> <HDBHang>{HDBHang}</HDBHang> <HDBTSCong>{HDBTSCong}</HDBTSCong> <HDBHDTQGia>{HDBHDTQGia}</HDBHDTQGia> <HDKhac>{HDKhac}</HDKhac> <CTu>{CTu}</CTu> </LHDSDung> <DSCTSSDung> {DSCTSSDung} </DSCTSSDung> </NDTKhai> </DLTKhai> <DSCKS> <NNT></NNT> <CCKSKhac/> </DSCKS> </TKhai>
